column4: I have a Dell E1505N that came with fiesty... I installed 8.04 from the dell provided ISO and everything seems to be mostly working.
Compiz must be turned on and the windows' menu bars seem to get messed up. How can I either make it work or turn off compiz?
thats what I was looking for as far as turning it off... but is there a configuration screen that covers detailed confguration? Would I have to install Emerald?
